medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms first noted approximately 1 year prior to presentation, beginning with the belief involving a misplaced necklace. Over months, she escalated her suspicions to include younger women threatening her marriage, leading to increased rage and uncharacteristic aggression.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Mild depression and anxiety for the preceding 6 years, no prior psychiatric history.
medical_history.family_history: No known family history of mental illness, substance abuse, or suicide.
medical_history.social_history: Emigrated from Eastern Europe in the 1970s; history of a successful business in New York City.
